content.description: An easier version of 'One Ring', also has only two bolts, flare climbing, and great gear. Starts 15' left of 'One Ring's' flake, at the left end of an arching crack. Link the two silver rings into the seam above. Crux is at the bulge before the crack widens. Step right into water chute to finish the same as 'One Ring'.
content.protection: Two bolts   Single rack to #3   Chain anchors
content.location: Located in the center of the N face. Immediately before the boulder step in the narrow corridor. Single 70m rap.

climbs.name: One Ring to Rule Them All
climbs.fa: Paul Muehl, Pete DeLannoy, Everett Akam, 7/3/88 (Ground-up)

content.description: Just another great Needles route, face climbing around a thin flare. Begin just left of 'The Eye of Sauron's' bolt line on a right facing flake. Take flake up to first bolt and a series of thin cracks. Sustained climbing with good gear takes you to the second bolt. Keep on the same path into the water chute straight above. Excellent belay perch. Hardware replaced by BHCC, 6/19/15.
content.protection: 2 bolts   Single rack to #2 (offsets always useful)   Nuts/RP's   Chain anchors
content.location: As your walking up the corridor, this route starts at the small boulder step. Just left of Eye of Sauron. Single 70m rap.

content.description: Part of the Near Downs Ridge line, this secluded crag has high quality rock with AM shade and PM sun. The north face is located in narrow corridor chock full of ferns and other various flora. Along with the numerous routes of all grades on the Near Downs, West Lies Mirkwood and the Far Downs this is a great place to get in a lot of high quality climbing without moving too far.
